title: Consumerism in a Denominational World. Friday PVK Q/A: May 7, 2021
description:
Bridges of Meaning Q/A, Conversation


Time stamps:

0:03:25  Intro
0:05:45  Stay Methodist or go elsewhere?
0:10:00  Were iconoclasts threatened by advances in art and now social media?
0:14:20  What’s PVK’s favorite Gospel?
0:17:00  Is the Song of Solomon erotic or aesthetic? 
0:19:30  Does apologetics make Jesus harder to sell?
0:30:45  How is the protest suppose to end in US Protestant nation?
0:55:50  What’s the difference between Evangelical and Mainline churches?  
1:10:10  Dilemma: not trampling on Christ’s image vs saving tortured people
1:24:20  What’s the definition of “literally true?”
1:27:10  PVK on: There’s more in our motivation than we realize
1:29:40  Is the Roman Catholic Church heretical according to PVK?
1:42:10  Pastors vs Parishioners practicing their faith
1:50:00  Recording the End of the world
1:51:00  How do you describe the Holy Spirit?
2:01:20  Family member names PVK
2:02:10  What is the unique change after Christ?   
2:11:35  What do you mean by Descartes’ dualism?
2:19:00. Is PVK’s stance on change of denomination a comfort or are basics more important than differences?
